measurements_data.source: United Kingdom, DEFRA (Department for Environment, Food, and Rural Affairs). 2017. "Digest of Waste and Resource Statistics: 2017 Edition." Department for Environment, Food, and Rural Affairs (DEFRA), Government of United Kingdom. March.

measurements_data.comments: 5; calculated based on composition and biodegradability of MSW-to-landfill in England and Wales, weighted average used; food/organic includes food (15 percent) and other organic (1.7 percent) waste; paper/cardboard includes paper (10.5 percent) and card (8.4 percent) waste; plastic includes plastic film (8.9 percent), dense plastic (11.3 percent) waste; other includes sanitary (2.2 percent), textile and shoe (5.7 percent), e-waste (1.5 percent), hazardous and battery (1.0 percent), carpet, underlay, and furniture (6 percent), other combustible (2.0 percent), brick, plaster, and soil (5.9 percent), other non-combustible (1.6 percent), and fines <10mm (2.5 percent) waste
